title: (pointed or scalloped) baseball style font?
content:
i’ve been looking for this font or a font like this for some time. i know it has some custom work to it but it’s too popular for everyone to be using the same “home made” font. any help would be greatly appreciated. thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203212409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/49138_3635.jpg)
